title: LFM - Supp & Top [Plat 2+]
body:
Currently looking for a support & top player for a team looking to reach challenger. We've currently peaked at plat III in ranked teams but have dropped to plat V due to changes in players and roles. Two of our members have both reached top 16 challenger in ranked teams in season 5 and decayed to master in ranked teams. 

If you're interested in grinding to challenger in ranked teams with a positive and competitive environment feel free to apply.

**REQUIREMENTS**
Positive Attitude
Willing to play champions according to a team composition
Voice communication [Discord]
Decent amount of game knowledge
Versatile
A strong champion pool
In-depth knowledge about their position [Support or Top]
Be able to play at diamond or a higher level

_MUST HAVE A FAIR AMOUNT OF AVAILABILITY TO PLAY RANKED TEAMS _

**HOW TO APPLY**
1) Add "Azus"
2) Say you're from the forum post and further instructions will be instructed from there. :)

replies.body: Yo will you accept a plat 3 Top lane main? I have all the requirements you are looking for and willing to climb and learn. I added you
